name: Counting Sheep (dg)
description:
You are having a hard time getting to sleep.  You know the old adage of counting sheep to go to sleep, so you try that.  But the sheep just aren't cooperating.  You need to get that sheep dog in there to make the sheep stay in their pens until you can count them all.  Once the right counts are in the right pens, you fall asleep.  It doesn't last long, and you'll need to do it all over again.  I just gets harder and harder to get to sleep.

Use WASD or Arrows to move the dog.  The sheep will avoid the dog.

E or Spacebar makes the dog bark, which interacts with the sheep more and from further away.

I always stretch myself in some way for these jams, in this one I tried out boids for the first time.  It was a lot of fun, and the results of the sheep movement is very satisfying.  It turned out to be easier than expected to get some decent behaviors.
